add_sample_form_intro: Fill in the details for your new sample below
add_samples_intro_message: Add the pages or views to be included in the audit as samples
all_remaining_approved: All remaining unreviewed requirements have been marked as approved
audit_already_started_or_locked: Audit has already started or is locked
audit_locked_no_edit: The audit is locked Editing is not allowed
audit_not_locked_for_export: The audit must be locked in order to export Current status: {status}
audit_not_started_yet: The audit has not yet been started
browser_does_not_support_download: Your browser does not support direct file downloads
comment_to_auditor: Internal note (not visible in the final report)
confirm_approve_all_message: Are you sure you want to mark all remaining unreviewed requirements for this sample as 'Passed'
confirm_delete_sample: Are you sure you want to delete the sample "{sampleName}"
critical_error_language_system_init_fail: Critical error Language system could not be initialized Check console
critical_error_saving_session_data_lost: Critical error Could not save audit data to session Data may be lost on reload
critical_error_system_render_view_failed: System error View could not be rendered Check console
error_audit_data_missing_for_list: Error Audit data (rule file) missing for displaying the list
error_component_load: Error Component for view "{viewName}" could not be loaded (invalid structure or not defined)
error_file_must_be_json: The file must be in JSON format
error_internal_cannot_start_audit_deps_m: Internal error Cannot start audit due to missing dependencies
error_invalid_saved_audit_file: The selected file is not a valid or is a corrupted saved audit file
error_loading_data_for_view: Could not load data for view: {viewName}
error_loading_sample_list_for_overview: Error The sample list could not be loaded for the overview
error_loading_sample_or_requirement_data: Error Could not load data for sample or requirement
error_loading_view_details: Could not load view: {viewName} See console for technical details
error_min_one_content_type: At least one content type must be selected
error_no_active_audit: Error No active audit to display Start a new one or load an existing one
error_no_active_audit_to_save_metadata: Error No active audit found to save metadata
error_no_rulefile_for_form: Error Rule file is missing to build the form
error_no_rulefile_loaded_for_metadata: Error No rule file is loaded Please upload a rule file to enter metadata
error_no_samples_to_start_audit: You must add at least one sample to start the audit
error_reading_session_data_lost: Error reading saved session Previous data may be lost
error_render_add_sample_form_deps_missin: Could not render form due to missing dependencies
error_render_metadata_view: Could not render the metadata view
error_render_requirement_audit_view: Could not render the requirement audit view
error_render_requirement_list_view: Could not render the requirement list view
error_render_sample_management_view_deps: Could not render sample management due to missing dependencies
error_saving_audit: Error occurred while saving the audit
excel_status_select_from_list: Please select a valid value from the list ({list})
metadata_form_instruction: All fields are optional This information will be included in exported reports
no_failed_requirements_to_export: There are no failed requirements to export
no_relevant_requirements_for_sample: No relevant requirements were found for this sample based on the selected content types
no_requirements_to_approve: There are no remaining unreviewed requirements to approve
no_samples_added: No samples have been added yet
relevant_requirements_for_sample: Displaying all relevant requirements for the sample: {sampleDescription}
rule_file_invalid_json: The uploaded file is not valid JSON
rule_file_loaded_successfully: Rule file successfully loaded and validated
rule_file_metadata_contenttypes_array_of: Rule file 'metadata.contentTypes' must be an array of objects, where each object has non-empty strings for 'id' and 'text'
rule_file_metadata_missing_pagetypes_con: Required 'pageTypes' and/or 'contentTypes' are missing within the 'metadata' object in the rule file
rule_file_metadata_must_be_object: Rule file 'metadata' must be an object
rule_file_metadata_pagetypes_array_of_st: Rule file 'metadata.pageTypes' must be an array of non-empty strings
rule_file_metadata_title_required: Rule file 'metadata.title' is required and cannot be empty
rule_file_missing_keys: The rule file is missing required keys: {missingKeys}
rule_file_requirement_id_empty: The requirement's ID (for '{requirementTitleOrKey}') must be a non-empty string
rule_file_requirement_invalid_object: A requirement (key: {requirementKey}) in the rule file is not a valid object
rule_file_requirement_missing_keys: A requirement in the rule file (ID: {requirementId}) is missing required fields: {missingKeys}
rule_file_requirements_must_be_object: The 'requirements' section of the rule file must be an object (not an array)
sample_description_auto_filled: The description has been auto-filled with the page type, but can be edited
upload_view_intro: Welcome! Please upload a saved audit or start a new audit by uploading a rule file
validation_internal_schema_error: Internal validation error Schema definition is missing or corrupt
warning_save_file_newer_version: Warning The save file is from a newer version of the tool ({fileVersionInFile} vs {appVersion})
no_checks_for_this_requirement: No checks defined for this requirement
error_internal_data_structure_pc: Internal error Invalid data structure for updating pass criterion
todo_next_unhandled_requirement: TODO Navigate to next unhandled requirement
condition_not_met_criteria_auto_passed: Since the condition doesn't apply, these points are automatically passed
cannot_change_criteria_if_check_not_comp: Criteria cannot be changed when the control point is marked 'Does not comply'
check_marked_as_not_compliant_criteria_p: The control point is marked as 'Does not comply' underlying criteria have been automatically marked as passed and are not shown
no_actions_available: No actions are available at the moment
no_audit_metadata_available: No audit metadata is available at the moment
pc_observation_detail_label: Provide a more detailed description of the observation
